D

decideBestPair(Card[], Card[]) - Method in class game.PokerRules
Method that determines which one of two sets of cards that both have one pair, has the highest pair.
decideBestStraight(Card[], Card[]) - Method in class game.PokerRules
Method that decides which of two sets of cards, both containing a straight, is the best hand.
decideBestThreeOfAKind(Card[], Card[]) - Method in class game.PokerRules
Method that decides which of two set of cards, both containing three of a kind, is the best hand.
decideBestTwoPair(Card[], Card[]) - Method in class game.PokerRules
Method that decides which of two set of cards, both containing two pair, is the best hand.
decideHighestCard(Card[], Card[]) - Method in class game.PokerRules
Method that determines which one of two sets of cards that contains the highest card.

Class which generates a deck

determineHandRank(Card[]) - Method in class game.PokerRules
Determines the highest possible rank of the five cards given as an input.
determineWinner() - Method in class game.Game
Determines which player who has the best hand.
